Why is this 720p?
720p is generally considered 1280x720 at full 16:9
Because the movie was shot at 2.35:1, 544 * 2.35 = 1280.

720p = 1280 horizontal, anything vertical.
1080p = 1920 horizontal, anything vertical.

But why are the screen shots so noisy? the screen shots from SilverTorrent (http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7955704/Dredd_2012_720p_BRRip_x264_AC3-PTpOWeR_%28SilverTorrent%29) are not noisy like this.
